name: Clan Of Owl
description:
You enter the world a the last remaining member of the famous Guardano Owl Clan. Your goal is to find all the members of your new family, mark your territory, defeat all the bosses, enemy clans, and finally the super bosses.

Come and customize your own owl!! Plenty of color combinations to choose from.

Thanks for supporting Wildfoot games! We are trying our best to being you the most action packed animal simulators on the app stores. Clan of Owl is the latest installment of our adventure animal simulator games.

The most action packed owl simulator game on the app store. Loaded with all your favorite forest animals including: Fox, Deer, Wolf, Horse, Pony, Bear, and Giant Eagle. Enter this forest world as a young bird, help him find his family, grow into a huge giant owl, and dominate the forest. Your family members will be your ultimate guardians. You must learn to use them in order to win the game.

**Customize your Owl Color by pressing the Edit button on the 'Me' page**
**8 Different Color and Style Options to Choose From**

Other enemies include : Fawn, Deer, Eagle, Bear, Duck, Wolf, and Fox. Be fast and race around the huge map and hunt down your enemies. Hunt them before they get you. This game is Part Wild Animal Survival, Part Role Playing, and Totally Action Packed. Dynamic time of day and weather.

Magic spells include : Electric Shock, Fireball, Healing, and Invincibility.

Top App Features:
-- Fast paced and action packed Owl simulator
-- Find all 6 of your family members
-- Locate all the magic books
-- Call your clan members when you are near your enemies
-- Realistic wild animal sound effects and weather effects
-- Open World Style survival game
-- Huge 3D Map


Map Features Include:
Waterfalls and Lava
Destructible Logs
Movable tree trunks
High Grass
Hidden Caves
Trees, Rivers, and much more!!

How to Play:
1. Mark your territory
2. Find all 6 Owl Clan members
3. Find all the 4 magic spell books
4. Defeat all 6 Bosses
5. Defeat all 4 enemy Clans
6. Defeat all 6 Super bosses
---When you complete all of the above- You Win!!--

Do you like this game? We would love it if you let us know what you think. We tried hard to respond to all comments and listen to your suggestions. At Wildfoot, we love 3D animal simulators and our goal is to set the standard of quality for animal sims.

Please come check out our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for updates. Remember that friendship is magic. Find your guardians and create your own legend! Thanks for playing our games!!
